entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gaspé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:32 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gaspé Airport 12:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 1.
